domain.description: The domain relating to the audit entry; examples include Bonus-Card, HHT, Online, Tlogs etc.

sourceSystem.description: The source system or service that the audit data has come from e.g. NominationProcess

entity.description: The name of the entity that is being recorded e.g. NominatedCard

environment.description: The environment i.e. Production, UAT, Development

timestamp.description: The datetime of the audit entry
